text: @senatemajldr @realDonaldTrump Now you want everyone to come together, you myrtle the turtle looking bastard! You didn’t want to do right by the American people when YOU were faced with undeniable obstruction of justice and corruption. You better stay inside cause your old ass won’t last outside! #coronavirus
